verses.text: \w What|strong="G5101"\w* shall we \w say|strong="G2046"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* that \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w*, as pertaining \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, hath \w found|strong="G2147"\w*?

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* were \w justified|strong="G1344"\w* \w by|strong="G1537"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, he \w hath|strong="G2192"\w* \add whereof\add* to \w glory|strong="G2745"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w before|strong="G4314"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* the \w scripture|strong="G1124"\w*? \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it was \w counted|strong="G3049"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* to him that \w worketh|strong="G2038"\w* \w is|strong="G3049"\w* the \w reward|strong="G3408"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w reckoned|strong="G3049"\w* \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w debt|strong="G3783"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* to him that \w worketh|strong="G2038"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w believeth|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* him that \w justifieth|strong="G1344"\w* the \w ungodly|strong="G0765"\w*, \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* is \w counted|strong="G3049"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.

Even \w as|strong="G2509"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w describeth|strong="G3004"\w* the \w blessedness|strong="G3108"\w* of the \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, unto \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w imputeth|strong="G3049"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*,

\add Saying\add*, \w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \add are\add* they \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w iniquities|strong="G0458"\w* are \w forgiven|strong="G0863"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* are \w covered|strong="G1943"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="G0435"\w* to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w will|strong="G3049"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w impute|strong="G3049"\w* \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*.

\add Cometh\add* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w blessedness|strong="G3108"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \add only\add*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*? \w for|strong="G1063"\w* we \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* was \w reckoned|strong="G3049"\w* to \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w How|strong="G4459"\w* was \w it|strong="G3049"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* \w reckoned|strong="G3049"\w*? when he \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w*? \w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w received|strong="G2983"\w* the \w sign|strong="G4592"\w* of \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w*, a \w seal|strong="G4973"\w* of the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* of the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w which|strong="G1722"\w* \add he had yet\add* \w being|strong="G1722"\w* \w uncircumcised|strong="G0203"\w*: \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* might \w be|strong="G1511"\w* the \w father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* them that \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*, though they \w be|strong="G1223"\w* not \w circumcised|strong="G0203"\w*; \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* might be \w imputed|strong="G3049"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* to them who \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w who|strong="G4748"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4748"\w* in the \w steps|strong="G2487"\w* of that \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w of|strong="G3962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w father|strong="G3962"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, \w which|strong="G1722"\w* \add he had\add* \w being|strong="G1722"\w* \add yet\add* \w uncircumcised|strong="G0203"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*, that \w he|strong="G0846"\w* should \w be|strong="G1511"\w* the \w heir|strong="G2818"\w* of the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, \add was\add* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w to|strong="G4690"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w*, \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* they which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \add be\add* \w heirs|strong="G2818"\w*, \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* is made \w void|strong="G2758"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* made of none \w effect|strong="G2673"\w*:

\w Because|strong="G1063"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w worketh|strong="G2716"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, \add there is\add* \w no|strong="G3761"\w* \w transgression|strong="G3847"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \add it is\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \add it might be\add* \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*; to the \w end|strong="G1519"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* might \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w sure|strong="G0949"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w seed|strong="G4690"\w*; \w not|strong="G3756"\w* to \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* which is \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* to \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* which is \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*; \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w us|strong="G2257"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*,

(\w As|strong="G2531"\w* it is \w written|strong="G1125"\w*, I have \w made|strong="G5087"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* a \w father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*,) \w before|strong="G2713"\w* him \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*, \add even\add* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, who \w quickeneth|strong="G2227"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w calleth|strong="G2564"\w* those things which \w be|strong="G5607"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* though they \w were|strong="G5607"\w*.

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w against|strong="G3844"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*, \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* might \w become|strong="G1096"\w* the \w father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w nations|strong="G1484"\w*; according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* that which was \w spoken|strong="G2046"\w*, \w So|strong="G3779"\w* \w shall|strong="G2071"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* \w be|strong="G2071"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w being|strong="G0770"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w weak|strong="G0770"\w* in \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, he \w considered|strong="G2657"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* his \w own|strong="G1438"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w now|strong="G2235"\w* \w dead|strong="G3499"\w*, when he was \w about|strong="G4225"\w* an hundred years \w old|strong="G1541"\w*, neither \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* the \w deadness|strong="G3500"\w* \w of|strong="G3388"\w* \w Saraâ€™s|strong="G4564"\w* \w womb|strong="G3388"\w*:

He \w staggered|strong="G1252"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* through \w unbelief|strong="G0570"\w*; \w but|strong="G0235"\w* was \w strong|strong="G1743"\w* in \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w giving|strong="G1325"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* being fully \w persuaded|strong="G4135"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, \w what|strong="G3739"\w* he had \w promised|strong="G1861"\w*, he \w was|strong="G2076"\w* \w able|strong="G1415"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to \w perform|strong="G4160"\w*.
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w therefore|strong="G1352"\w* it was \w imputed|strong="G3049"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* it \w was|strong="G1125"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sake|strong="G1223"\w* \w alone|strong="G3440"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* it was \w imputed|strong="G3049"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w*;

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* it \w shall|strong="G3195"\w* be \w imputed|strong="G3049"\w*, if \w we|strong="G3588"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* him that raised \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* was \w delivered|strong="G3860"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w offences|strong="G3900"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* was raised \w again|strong="G1453"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w justification|strong="G1347"\w*.
